patterns.hint: Services not running. Start them: docker compose up -d
Webhook URL may have changed. Check n8n UI → Workflow → Webhook node for the current URL
n8n is not running. Start it: docker compose up -d n8n (default port: 5678)
Missing n8n credential. Open n8n UI → Settings → Credentials and configure the required service
Execution data growing. Set EXECUTIONS_DATA_PRUNE=true and EXECUTIONS_DATA_MAX_AGE=168 in n8n env
Hardcoded credential in workflow. Use n8n credential store, never hardcode in JSON. See PROJECT.md #Architecture Rules.
Workflow missing error handler. Every workflow must have an error trigger node. See PROJECT.md #n8n Conventions.
Missing /health endpoint. Every FastAPI service needs one for Docker health checks. See PROJECT.md #Python Service Rules.
